lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Dec. 2 -- Because they gave the world the story of the scuttling of the French fleet at Toulon last Friday several members of the editorial staff of Havas, the official news agency in Vichy, France, are under arrest, threatened with trial for "disseminating false information."
abstract: France: Havas ed staff members under arrest on charges of giving false information
